Simulate Dose-Response Data from a Beta Model

Source: R/simulate_beta.R
simulate_beta.Rd

Simulates dose-response data using a normalized beta model.

simulate_beta(
  dose_levels,
  n_per_dose,
  e0,
  emax,
  delta1,
  delta2,
  scal,
  sigma,
  dist = "normal",
  df = 3,
  seed = NULL
)

Arguments

dose_levels

Numeric vector of dose levels.

n_per_dose

Sample size per dose level.

e0

Baseline effect.

emax

Maximum effect.

delta1

Left beta shape parameter.

delta2

Right beta shape parameter.

scal

Normalization factor for dose (max dose should not exceed `scal`).

sigma

Residual error SD.

dist

Distribution for residuals: "normal", "lognormal", "uniform", "t", or "gamma".

df

Degrees of freedom for t-distribution.

seed

Optional random seed.

Value

Data frame with id, dose, pred, ipred, and scenario.
